mapper.select: SELECT PREG_GOODS_NO /* prPregGoodsPrcHist.getPregGoodsPriceHist */ , TO_CHAR(HIST_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS HIST_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(HIST_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS HIST_END_DTM , SUP_PCOST , NOR_PRC , SALE_PRC , MRGN_RATE , PRC_CHG_CAUS_CD , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_PREG_GOODS_PRC_HIST WHERE PREG_GOODS_NO = #{pregGoodsNo}
